pythag.c

00001 #include <math.h>
00002 #define NRANSI
00003 #include "nrutil.h"
00004 
00005 double my_pythag(double a, double b)
00006 {
00007         double absa,absb;
00008         absa=fabs(a);
00009         absb=fabs(b);
00010         if (absa > absb) return absa*sqrt(1.0+SQR(absb/absa));
00011         else return (absb == 0.0 ? 0.0 : absb*sqrt(1.0+SQR(absa/absb)));
00012 }
00013 #undef NRANSI
